title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
alternative_titles: 風の谷のナウシカ (Kaze no Tani no Naushika)
synopsis: Nausicaä, the princess of the Valley of the Wind, strives to protect her people and understand the ecological and political conflicts in a post-apocalyptic world. As she confronts the toxic Sea of Decay and its creatures, she seeks a path to coexistence and peace.

title: Castle in the Sky
alternative_titles: 天空の城ラピュタ (Tenkū no Shiro Rapyuta)
synopsis: Pazu and Sheeta embark on a quest to find the mythical floating city of Laputa, using a mysterious crystal pendant as their guide. Along the way, they face air pirates and government agents who are also in search of the legendary city's secrets.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
alternative_titles: となりのトトロ (Tonari no Totoro)
synopsis: Satsuki and Mei, two young sisters, move to the countryside with their father while their mother recovers in a nearby hospital. They encounter Totoro, a gentle forest spirit, and other magical creatures. Together, they experience the wonder and beauty of the natural world.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
alternative_titles: 火垂るの墓 (Hotaru no Haka)
synopsis: A devastating meditation on the human cost of war, this animated tale follows Seita (Tsutomu Tatsumi), a teenager charged with the care of his younger sister, Setsuko (Ayano Shiraishi), after an American firebombing during World War II separates the two children from their parents. Their tale of survival is as heartbreaking as it is true to life. The siblings rely completely on each other and struggle against all odds to stay together and stay alive.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
alternative_titles: 魔女の宅急便 (Majo no Takkyūbin)
synopsis: Kiki, a young witch, sets out on a journey to find her place in the world. With her talking cat, Jiji, by her side, she starts a delivery service in a coastal town. As she faces challenges and meets new friends, Kiki learns valuable lessons about independence and self-discovery.

title: Only Yesterday
alternative_titles: おもひでぽろぽろ (Omohide Poro Poro)
synopsis: Taeko, a young woman from Tokyo, takes a trip to the countryside and reflects on her childhood memories. As she reconnects with her past, Taeko comes to terms with her present and contemplates her dreams and desires.

title: Porco Rosso
alternative_titles: 紅の豚 (Kurenai no Buta)
synopsis: Set in the Adriatic Sea between the World Wars, Porco Rosso tells the tale of Marco, a former World War I ace cursed to live as a pig. As a freelance bounty hunter and pilot, he battles air pirates while navigating the skies of the Adriatic.

title: Ocean Waves
alternative_titles: 海がきこえる (Umi ga Kikoeru)
synopsis: Taku reminisces about his high school days in Kochi, Japan, and the love story that unfolded during that time. He recalls his complex relationships with friends and the impact of a new student, Rikako, on his life.

title: Pom Poko
alternative_titles: 平成狸合戦ぽんぽこ (Heisei Tanuki Gassen Ponpoko)
synopsis: A group of shape-shifting tanuki (raccoon dogs) in Tama Hills, Tokyo, use their supernatural abilities to resist the urban development that threatens their forest home. They engage in various comical and clever tactics to protect their habitat.

title: Whisper of the Heart
alternative_titles: 耳をすませば (Mimi o Sumaseba)
synopsis: Shizuku, a young girl with a passion for reading and writing, discovers a mysterious antique cat figurine in an antique shop. This discovery sets her on a journey of self-discovery and leads her to uncover the story of the cat's owner.

title: Princess Mononoke
alternative_titles: もののけ姫 (Mononoke Hime)
synopsis: Set in a conflict between the forest spirits and industrialists, a young warrior named Ashitaka becomes entangled in the struggle for the forest's survival. He seeks a way to reconcile the opposing forces and find peace.

title: My Neighbors the Yamadas
alternative_titles: ホーホケキョとなりの山田くん (Hōhokekyo Tonari no Yamada-kun)
synopsis: This comical and heartwarming film provides a glimpse into the daily lives and adventures of the Yamada family, a typical Japanese family facing everyday challenges with humor and love.

title: Spirited Away
alternative_titles: 千と千尋の神隠し (Sen to Chihiro no Kamikakushi)
synopsis: Chihiro, a young girl, and her parents stumble upon a mysterious and magical world. When her parents are transformed into pigs, Chihiro embarks on a journey to rescue them and find her way back to the human world. Along the way, she encounters strange creatures and powerful spirits.

title: The Cat Returns
alternative_titles: 猫の恩返し (Neko no Ongaeshi)
synopsis: After saving a cat, Haru finds herself in a whimsical cat kingdom where she is treated like royalty. She must navigate this fantastical world and find a way back to her own reality with the help of her new feline friends.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
alternative_titles: ハウルの動く城 (Hauru no Ugoku Shiro)
synopsis: Sophie, a young woman cursed with old age, encounters the enigmatic wizard Howl and his magical moving castle. As she joins Howl on a magical journey, she becomes involved in a complex conflict that tests her courage and inner strength.

title: Tales from Earthsea
alternative_titles: ゲド戦記 (Gedo Senki)
synopsis: A young prince named Arren and a wandering wizard named Sparrowhawk embark on a quest to unravel the mysteries of a troubled world. They seek to restore balance and confront a dark force that threatens all of Earthsea.

title: Ponyo
alternative_titles: 崖の上のポニョ (Gake no Ue no Ponyo)
synopsis: Ponyo, a fish with a strong desire to become human, befriends a young boy named Sosuke. Their deep connection leads to a fantastical underwater and above-water adventure as they strive to fulfill their dreams.

title: The Secret World of Arrietty
alternative_titles: 借りぐらしのアリエッティ (Kari-gurashi no Arietti)
synopsis: Arrietty is a Borrower, a tiny person living beneath the floorboards of a human house. Her world changes when she forms a secret friendship with Shawn, a young human boy. Together, they face challenges and learn about trust and friendship.

title: From Up on Poppy Hill
alternative_titles: コクリコ坂から (Kokuriko-zaka Kara)
synopsis: Set in Yokohama in 1963, a group of students work together to save a historic building known as the Quartier Latin Clubhouse. As they strive to protect their cherished place, they also uncover family secrets and a sense of belonging.

title: The Wind Rises
alternative_titles: 風立ちぬ (Kaze Tachinu)
synopsis: A biographical drama based on the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the designer of Japan's famous Mitsubishi A6M Zero fighter plane. The film explores his passion for aviation and the complexities of creation during a time of war.

title: The Tale of the Princess Kaguya
alternative_titles: かぐや姫の物語 (Kaguya-hime no Monogatari)
synopsis: A bamboo cutter discovers a tiny princess inside a bamboo shoot and raises her with his wife. As the princess grows into a beautiful woman, she faces the challenges of her destiny, including noble suitors and her celestial origins.

title: When Marnie Was There
alternative_titles: 思い出のマーニー (Omoide no Mānī)
synopsis: Anna, a young girl with emotional struggles, forms a deep and mysterious bond with Marnie, a girl from a grand mansion. Their friendship takes Anna on a journey of self-discovery and understanding.

title: The Red Turtle
alternative_titles: レッドタートル ある島の物語 (Reddo Tātoru: Aru Shima no Monogatari)
synopsis: A man is stranded on a deserted island and forms a deep connection with a mysterious red turtle. Through their unique bond, they face the challenges and wonders of nature, life, and the passing of time.

title: Earwig and the Witch
alternative_titles: アーヤと魔女 (Āya to Majo)
synopsis: Earwig, a young girl, is adopted by a witch and must use her wits to outsmart her new caretaker. As she navigates the challenges of life in a magical household, she discovers her own powers and strengths.

title: The Boy and the Heron
alternative_titles: 君たちはどう生きるか (Kimitachi wa Dō Ikiru ka)
synopsis: Mahito, a young 12-year-old boy, struggles to settle in a new town after his mother's death. However, when a talking heron informs Mahito that his mother is still alive, he enters an abandoned tower in search of her, which takes him to another world.
